Question
========

A diagnostic tool for the rare tropical disease Waldorps Black Fever (WBF) has sensitivity 0.80 and specificity 0.90. The probability of a traveler contracting the disease is 0.07. What is the probability that someone who the instrument says has the disease actually has WBF leads?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.25
* 0.38
* 0.82

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.25: Incorrect
* 0.38: Correct
* 0.82: Incorrect
